name: Al-One
description:
2D platformer, you have to gather 3 diffrent crystals from other planet to power your ship and fly to home!

W,S,A,D  or Arrows for movement.

F for jetpack.

Click on [S] in left corner for settings. 

Play in browser or download a build, you can also ask me for source code.

Made with Unity 2020.1.5f1

Have fun, leave a comment ;-)
